member.name: M:HRCountriesServicesSolution.Areas.HelpPage.ObjectGenerator.GenerateObject(System.Type)
member.summary: Generates an object for a given type. The type needs to be public, have a public default constructor and settable public properties/fields. Currently it supports the following types: Simple types: , , , , , etc. Complex types: POCO types. Nullables: . Arrays: arrays of simple types or complex types. Key value pairs: Tuples: , , etc Dictionaries: or anything deriving from . Collections: , , , , , or anything deriving from or . Queryables: , .
member.returns: An object of the given type.

member.name: T:HRCountriesServicesSolution.DAL.BufferisedHRCountryBorderRepository
member.summary: A buffer class to contain data loaded from a local json file. Used to avoid database access on an azure env.

member.name: M:HRCountriesServicesSolution.DAL.BufferisedHRCountryBorderRepository.Init(System.String)
member.summary: 1- If Buffer is null 1.1- Asynchronous Load of jsonData file 1.2- ForEach Feature retrieved, add a new HRCountryBorder with ISO3/alpha3Code and Features/OgcFeature 2- Else retrun directly as buffer is loaded Does not catch any Exception and throw one if pathToLocalJSon is null
member.param: Server path of json file containing data
member.returns: true or throw an exception

member.name: M:HRCountriesServicesSolution.DAL.BufferisedHRCountryBorderRepository.GetBorderCountriesAsync
member.summary: 1- Init buffer 2- Return initialized buffer Does not catch any Exception
member.returns: All HRBorderCountry available

member.name: M:HRCountriesServicesSolution.DAL.BufferisedHRCountryBorderRepository.GetBorderCountriesByAlpha3CodeAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Get a HRBorderCountry from its alpha3Code. 1- Init Buffer 2- Iterate in buffer to get the alpha3Code Does not catch any Exception and throw one if _countriesBorderBuffer is null.
member.returns: The HRCounrtyBorder if exists or null.

member.name: T:HRWebServices.Controllers.HRCountriesIterationController
member.summary: Provide a Rest service for resource CountriesIteration

member.name: M:HRWebServices.Controllers.HRCountriesIterationController.#ctor(HRCountriesServicesSolution.Business.ICountriesIterationService)
member.summary: Constructor dependancy injection

member.name: M:HRWebServices.Controllers.HRCountriesIterationController.Alpha3Code(System.String)
member.summary: Get CountrieIteration for a specific ALPHA3CODE. 1- If _countriesIterationService is available, return service Result 2- If _countriesIterationService throw an exception, return a CountriesIteration with the resulting error. 3- Else, return a CountriesIteration with unavailability Error.
member.param: ISO3166 CountryCode. MaxLength = 3. Can be null
member.returns: CountriesIteration

member.name: M:HRWebServices.Controllers.HRCountriesIterationController.byRegion(System.String)
member.summary: Get a CountriesIteration for a specific Region 1- If _countriesIterationService is available, return service Result 2- If _countriesIterationService throw an exception, return a CountriesIteration with the resulting error. 3- Else, return a CountriesIteration with unavailability Error.
member.returns: If id can not be retrieved, return {countries:[], finalItemsCount:0, iterationKey:''}

member.name: M:HRWebServices.Controllers.HRCountriesIterationController.Get(System.String)
member.summary: Provide CountriesIteration for a specific iteration Id 1- If _countriesIterationService is available, return service Result 2- If _countriesIterationService throw an exception, return a CountriesIteration with the resulting error. 3- Else, return a CountriesIteration with unavailability Error. Note This service is asynchronous in backend. A specific delay of 2 seconds can be added for test purpose.
member.param: String without constraint. Give a null parameter for the first iteration. BackEnd will generate the folllowing iteration sequence in the response body.
member.returns: If id can not be retrieved, return {countries:[], finalItemsCount:0, iterationKey:''}

member.name: T:HRWebServices.Controllers.HRCountryBorderController
member.summary: Provide a Rest service for resource HRCountryBorder containing OGCFeature of a country (Check : http://www.opengeospatial.org/standards/sfa for more details)

member.name: M:HRWebServices.Controllers.HRCountryBorderController.#ctor(HRCountriesServicesSolution.Business.IBorderService)
member.summary: Constructeur pour injection de d√©pendance.

member.name: M:HRWebServices.Controllers.HRCountryBorderController.GetAsync
member.summary: Retrieve all Known Features. 1- If _borderService is available, return the resulting service result 2- If _borderService throw an Exception, return a HRCountryBorder with an errorDescription of the Exception 3- Else return a HRCountryBorder with an errorDescription indicating that service is not available.
member.returns: List Of all Know Country Features by Alpha3 Code

member.name: M:HRWebServices.Controllers.HRCountryBorderController.byAlpha3Code(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieve a Country Feature by his specific Alpha3Code. 1- If _borderService is available, return the resulting service result 2- If _borderService throw an Exception, return a HRCountryBorder with an errorDescription of the Exception 3- Else return a HRCountryBorder with an errorDescription indicating that service is not available.
member.param: String MinLength = 3 and MaxLength = 3. For details on ISO3166 Alpha3Code check : https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-3
member.returns: The CountryFeature with his Alpha3Code. Return {"alpha3Code":null,"oGCFeature":null} if Alpha3Code can not be found.

member.name: T:HRWebServices.Controllers.HRRegionController
member.summary: Provide Rest Service for resource HRRegion

member.name: M:HRWebServices.Controllers.HRRegionController.#ctor(HRCountriesServicesSolution.Business.IHRRegionsService)
member.summary: Constructor for dependancy injection

member.name: M:HRWebServices.Controllers.HRRegionController.Get
member.summary: Get all HRRegions available. 1- If regionService is available, return the resulting service 2- If regionService is unavailable return a IEnumerable"HRRegion" Fill with a HRRegion Error 3- If any Exception is catch, return a IEnumerable"HRRegion" Fill with a HRRegion Error describing the Exception.
member.returns: List of HRRegion

member.name: M:HRWebServices.Controllers.HRRegionController.Get(System.Int32)
member.summary: Get HRRegion by Id 1- If regionService is available, return the resulting service 2- If regionService throw an Error, return a HRRegion Filled with an ErrorDescription of the Exception. 3- Else if _regionService is unavailable return a HRRegion Fill an ErrorDescription
member.returns: HRRegion

member.name: T:HRWebServices.Controllers.HRWebCamsTravelController
member.summary: Provide Rest Service for resource WebCamsTravelRootObject

member.name: M:HRWebServices.Controllers.HRWebCamsTravelController.#ctor(HRCountriesServicesSolution.Business.IWebCamsTravelService)
member.summary: Constructeur pour injection de d√©pendance.

member.name: M:HRWebServices.Controllers.HRWebCamsTravelController.Get(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Retrieve the best popular WebCam of LifeTime type for a town of a given country. This provider is directly connected to webcamstravel service available on p.mashape.com. Coming soon, a specific version on Database supported by MongoDB. 1- If webCamService is available, return the resulting service 2- If webCamService throw an Error, return a WebCamsTravelRootObject Filled with an ErrorDescription of the Exception. 3- Else if webCamService is unavailable return a WebCamsTravelRootObject Fill an ErrorDescription
member.param: a Town name of the given Country.
